caption.p: NO inhibitory effects of W. glabra essential oil on lipopolysaccharide (LPS)-activated RAW 264.7 cells. CELL: blank control; DMSO: blank control with DMSO; LPS: LPS control; DJ4, DJ20 and DJ100: the essential oil at 4, 20 and 100 μg·mL −1 respectively; DEX: positive control of Dexamethasone; ***: p < 0.001 vs. LPS group ( n = 4).
